document.full_text: a wave of start-ups, including groupme, fastsociety and beluga, are offering apps that allow multiple users to participate in smartphone text conversations.
document.title: start-ups are in a rush to bring the chat room to the smartphone
lines_and_colors: a wave of start-ups, including groupme, fastsociety and beluga, are offering apps that allow multiple users to participate in smartphone text conversations.
